text: Dongmen is a metro station on the Tamsui-Xinyi Line and Zhonghe-Xinlu Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code of the Tamsui-Xinyi line station is R07 and the station code of the Zhonghe-Xinlu line station is O06. == Station layout information == Both station platforms are located underground. The Tamsui- Xinyi line platforms are stacked on top of each other, which is the same for the Zhonghe-Xinlu line platforms. This allows you to walk straight ahead to the front platform when transferring without having to walk long distances. Platform 1 is served by the Zhonghe-Xinlu line and is for Luzhou or Huilong. Platform 2 is served by the Tamsui-Xinyi line and is for Tamsui or Beitou. Platform 3 is served by the Zhonghe-Xinlu line and is for Nanshijiao. Platform 4 is served by the Tamsui-Xinyi line and is for Xiangshan or Daan. == Around the station == * Daan Forest Park Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Dongmen metro station
